title: Xin Zhao Original Concept
body: So this was an initial concept sketch of Xin Zhao while he was under production. Don't get me wrong,  the Seneschal is awesome just as he is now. But does anybody else wish this would come to fruition as a skin? I'd pick it up in a heartbeat for that breastplate and the bearded (less baby-ish) face. Maybe they could convert it to a Dragonslayer skin?

replies.body: Since I main Xin, I would love to see them change it into a dragons layer, or a skin
